description:
Section 73 application (minor material amendment) to vary Condition No. 2  (approved plans) of planning permission Ref: P102640 dated 31/03/2011  for the: ‘The erection of a new hall within the playground towards the east of the site, new central entrance with new ramped and stepped access and associated railings. Removal of uPVC windows and replacement with new timber framed windows to the rear south elevation and extensions to provide additional classroom space.  Proposals also include the erection of temporary site cabins within the playground during construction works. ’.  The minor material amendments are:
A) Create a revised refuse and recycling facility fronting Noel Road in order to provide an open facility with the retention of the original railings and the provision of a new gate with associated works and alterations. [Listed Building Consent application P112407 also submitted].  This application may affect the character and appearance of a conservation area and the setting of a listed building.  Town and Country Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended); Sections 67 and 73.  
Further information and plans received.
